Projects

Movie Orbit

A web application that allows users to explore upcoming, trending, and genre-specific movies with a clean, intuitive interface for staying updated on new releases, trends, and personalized recommendations.

Gitstatz

Gitstatz is a web platform offering detailed GitHub account analysis, featuring an intuitive landing page and an analysis section for in-depth metrics and insights.

Image Quarry

Image Quarry is a React app that lets users search images via the Unsplash API. Upon entering a search term, it fetches and displays matching photos in a four-column grid layout.

Thoweave

Thoweave is a React app for easy note creation, organization, and management, offering a seamless note-taking experience with a simple, elegant design.
